content: first stitch off over the second continue to bind off in this way until all stitches are bound off cut yarn and pull tail through last stitch picking up stitches pick up a stitch for every stitch along horizontal and bound-off edges skip over loose stitches along the bound off edges pick up approx 3 stitches for every 4 row along vertical edges __________________________________________________________________________________________ 381 salmon brook street granby ct 06035 860 653-9700 www marjisyarncrafts com this pattern was written by marji lafreniere exclusively for marji s yarncrafts this pattern is not for use by others to make items for sale and not to be copied without permission
